download.title: Download NULS Wallet
download.maintainers: NULS wallet is developed by NULS core technical team

mainNetTesting.p2: Complete the main-net's development, testing phase commence
mainNetTesting.p4: Establish and expand the open-source development community

continuousImprovement.p2: Complete development of basic modules. Continuously improve build-in modules, such as smart contracts, multi-chain modules and cross-chain consensus.
continuousImprovement.p4: Start and promote more applications to be accessed within the NULS ecosystem.

releaseSmartContractModule.p4: Improve the main-chains overall ecosystem, including a blockchain browser, e-wallet, mobile wallet, Smart Contact virtual machinbe compiler, development tools, and multilingual adapters.

3NewProgrammingLanguages.p2: Add support for 3 programming languages to Smart Contracts

one.p3: Grasp self-evolution of network and storage modules (support Exabyte of data volume storage)
one.p4: Form a set of standard technical solutions to be used in various industries
one.p5: Establish a new ecosystem which is composed of blockchain and other fields such as big data and artificial intelligence

two.p1: Complete more functional modules, including POWER module and POS module
two.p3: At least 15 applications run on NULS
two.p4: Provide technicals solutions for at least 3 industries

three.p2: Build a mature open-source community, large scale set up application sub-chain

one.p2: Providing a complete solution to solve production and management in both industry and agriculture. Consisting of a complete technology platform for the integration of blockchain big data and artificial intelligence all in one ecosystem.

two.p2: At least 50 applications run on NULS
two.p3: Provides technical solutions for at least 20 industries, build eco ecosystem based on NULS, such as big data

three.p2: Build an open-source community integrated within the blockchain, big data, artificial intelligence sectors. Provide comprehensive value docking and collaboration platforms.

information.title: NULS is a highly customizable modular blockchain infrastructure
information.meta: It consists of a microkernel and functional modules. NULS provides smart contract, multi-chain mechanism and cross-chain consensus. It aims to break the technical barriers of blockchain, to reduce the cost of development, and to promote the usage of blockchain technology in the commercial field.

github.title: NULS is a global blockchain open-source project.
github.meta: NULS provides basic function modules and standard interfaces and promotes the concept of modularization and customization. Developers can develop various modules and customize their own subchains as needed. NULS is now acting as a blockchain technology platform for discovery, use and communication among developers.

faq.title: Learn more
faq.poc: POC (Proof of Credit) Consensus Mechanism Analysis

header.title: Our Partnerships
header.meta: NULS Partner Network is a collaborative framework between NULS and partners to meet different types of cooperation needs, including technical support, communication, community assistance, market expansion and marketing, to ensure that partners and NULS to achieve their goals.

header.title: NULS DApps
header.meta: Developers from NULS Community can develop various modules and applications as needed or select proper modules to customize subchains. NULS is building a future for distributed applications.

header.title: NULS Team
header.meta: The core members are highly-experienced and well-versed blockchain technology enthusiasts with experiences in managing community operation. Their shared purpose and philosophical ideology led them together to develop a novel Blockchain Internet Economy that aims to simplify trust in the blockchain technology.

header.title: Join NULS Community
header.meta: We are now recruiting committed and passionate individuals to contribute to NULS open-source community. Join us now! Together we can learn, grow and share, building something amazing in the process.
